uartsci_dma.c File Reference

The file implements the UART driver DMA Interface functionality which is available only for the R4 i.e. the MSS. More...

Detailed Description

The file implements the UART driver DMA Interface functionality which is available only for the R4 i.e. the MSS.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct UartSci_DriverDMA_t UartSci_DriverDMA

SCI Driver DMA Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the UART DMA.
